name: Train Defender
description:
Top down shooter, defend the wagons from the coyotes! - Made for GMTK Game Jam 2021.

(btw you can get ammo in the right-most wagon)

Initially, I wanted to make each wagon have a different mechanic (one had a shop, another one refilled your ammo), and you needed to protect and repair each wagon or else you'd lose that mechanic (if the enemies destroy the wagon). 

Because life got in the way, I made this simpler version of the game, and I aim to make this a finished game ready to publish in the next 2 weeks, if you like the concept, stay tuned for updates!
